topics.body:
Lucky Star ep 10 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]"They bought me a new cell phone!" THIS WILL END IN TEARS. I AM SURE OF IT.

that took all of 10 seconds >_>

[IRRITATION INTENSIFIES]

EMOTICONS.

JUST TALK TO HER. SHE'S YOUR SISTER. :P

did i just stumble upon another anime

wot

party at Konata's house... pretty much what you'd expect

I HATE HOW LITERALLY EVERYONE ON THE PLANET CAN SEE SHOOTING STARS AND NOT ME >:O

i mean oh wow a shooting star

Wait is Akira pronouncing "tsundere" as toon-dure? Is that how you're supposed to pronounce it?

And Minoru pronounces it as "soon-dara" and I don't know what to think anymore >_>

bye-niii ==-_-==[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Next ep is a Christmas episode, ok

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555d3460636872634fec0100#post_555d3460636872634fec0100
Warm is love, warm is life
